title: Best Laid Plans
description: Kate Winslow had her plans all laid out when her boyfriend, Jefferson Wescott, broke her heart. Making new plans, Kate became the owner of the most sought after wedding consulting firm in the city. However, her plans are upset again when Jeff walks back into her life, this time as the groom of one of the weddings she is coordinating. Will she be able to find out what God's plan is in her life before the wedding takes place?
author: Courtney Lyman
